Title: Rushdie 'pleased' with attacker's maximum sentence
Description: Author Sir Salman Rushdie says he hopes the man who stabbed him "reflects upon his deeds" in jail.

Title: The Beyerdynamic Aventho 300 sound great but short of the best
Description: The Aventho 300 won't let you down much for sound, but need an ANC boost to catch up to the best in the business.

Title: Honoring fallen military service members this Memorial Day
Description:
It's Memorial Day.
To honor the fallen military service members this year, the Up First newsletter asked readers to share stories of their loved ones.

Title: Her son had a meltdown in public. A stranger responded with understanding
Description:
In 2016, Tulika Prasad was at the grocery store checkout line with her seven-year-old son, who is non-verbal and autistic.
A woman understood what was going on when Prasad's son had an outburst.

Title: The European Space Agency will beam the famous 'Blue Danube' waltz into space
Description:
A performance of the masterpiece will be transmitted into space on Saturday.
The waltz has been associated with space travel since its inclusion in the film 2001: A Space Odyssey.

Title: I thought my only choice was to grow up, get a job, and start a family. Instead, I moved to Thailand.
Description: Before moving to Thailand, I had an hourlong commute each way and felt like I was always either at work or on my way there.

Title: K-pop fans desperate for one perfect photo of their idols are driving a booming rental market for Samsung phones
Description: Businesses have started offering day rentals of Samsung phones with powerful 10x zoom lenses, ensuring concert goers leave with perfect pictures.

Title: How to Build an STM32 Web Dashboard Using the Mongoose Wizard
Description:

Title: This Florida woman, 78, lives in her car — as more seniors in the Sunshine State suddenly face homelessness
Description: Older Americans aren't immune to homelessness.

Title: A physician who advocates for the power of human touch over technology will deliver Harvard’s commencement speech
Description: Abraham Verghese is a Stanford University professor, bestselling author and a prominent doctor who advocates for strengthening the physician-patient...

Title: Netflix’s Tylenol Murders Doc Dives Into a Chilling Unsolved Crime
Description: The main suspect in the Tylenol murders speaks out in a Netflix documentary

Title: Donald Trump’s Politics of Plunder
Description: Evan Osnos reports on America’s aspiring oligarchs, including Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos, and Mark Zuckerberg, and on opposition to corruption by Bernie Sanders, Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, and the Patriotic Millionaires.

Title: The Self-Taught Cook Who Mastered the Flour Tortilla
Description:
Some of the best Sonoran-style tortillas in the U.S.
are being made far from the border, in a college town forty miles outside Kansas City, Hannah Goldfield writes.

Title: The Scholars Deciphering a Lost Writing System
Description:
Ancient Incas recorded information by tying knots into long cords.
Will we ever be able to read them?

Title: America’s Democracy Is Still Resilient
Description: A distinct set of six institutions and traditions make the country hard to subjugate to an authoritarian’s will.

Title: How to Help Kids Navigate Our Dangerous World—With Science
Description: Research has shown ways parents can help children cope with the stressors of modern life

Title: 9 Facts You Probably Didn’t Know About Jules Verne’s ‘Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Seas’
Description: From its initial title to its real life inspirations to its disastrous, misconception-causing English translations.

Title: Best cameras under $2000 2025: Top picks to suit any budget
Description: Shopping with a specific budget in mind? We've tested out the best cameras under prices ranging from $200 to $2000 to get the best picks for each price point.
